section.title: Copying a Policy
section.para: You can copy a policy if its contents are similar to a new one that you want to create, then change the condition or event associated with it. This enables you to make new policies efficiently.

step.para: Click the Policies accordion, and select the policy you want to copy.

Click
(Configuration),
(Copy this Policy to new Policy).

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The new policy is created with a prefix of Copy of in its description, and it can be viewed in the Policy accordion.
